entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 10 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
